extendedInfo.description: Inspiration can be found anywhere.  The ColorClix App lets you instantly match any color you see to an OlympicÂ® Paint color.  It's never been easier to find the colors you'll love living with. Disclaimer: Please note that the on-screen color representations are not necessarily precise representations of actual paint colors due to variance in screen calibrations.

reviews.title: One star for your...
reviews.comment: vague change log of \"bug fixes\"?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: has potential but lacks access to all colors
reviews.comment: Pretty cool app.  Colors on my HTC screen match paint chips better than the web version on my laptop. Unfortunately, the only available colors are the ones from Olympic\'s pre-determined collections and the most popular colors.  It would be awesome if the user could at least type in the color code and see the color.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better Than Some Others; Not Great
reviews.comment: While this app is better than some others, it\'s still a lazy iPhone port.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unique concept.. Excellent execution..
reviews.comment: Mindblowing app.. Dowload now!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Vicky Kapadia

reviews.title: Fun Times
reviews.comment: Let\'s you pick and choose virtually before you pick, choose, test, and buy. Nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not that great
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t give u all the colors to choose from...very disappointing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not very good. I hope their paint is better.
reviews.comment: Neat idea, but buggy. Once I selected a picture to sample from, I couldn\'t select a ne picture. The app has potential, but no one \"sweated\" the details. This should be easy and reliable to use. As is, it\'s a non-starter.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great on my smartphone. I really like how you can buy samples from this app...makes my life easier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ok, but does not fill the screen on my HTC EVO 3d.  I wish you could search for any Olympic colors by name or #.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very useful to get color palettes,but nd way2 callibrate/WB screen 2 match act.color in photos. Not sure how accurate,but gd4ideas Nd app2 SD! EVO 2.3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ColorClix
reviews.comment: Concept is simple, but needs calibration and apps2sd, and the startup animation is annoying long.

reviews.comment: Amazing app to have when you are looking for inspiration. Very useful.

reviews.title: Best app on the market!
reviews.comment: This app works so well, and I can\'t wait to use it to pick out the paint for the rest of my house!

reviews.comment: Locked up on me.  Failed app

reviews.comment: Great idea but doesnt work. I just shot 4 pictures of the olympic paints in my house and it failed to identify any of them.

reviews.comment: This app is great. So easy to match a color and order a sample!

reviews.title: Color found!
reviews.comment: Found the perfect color to match my living room furniture. This tool made it easy... off to Lowes!

reviews.comment: Gr8 work ColorClix !! Good to have such a user friendly app & something so useful for anyone looking to paint their house !!
